tool_description: Validates and cleanses review data by checking for missing values, duplicate entries, invalid ratings, and data format consistency.

input_review_ids.description: List of review IDs to validate

required_fields.description: List of required field names that must be present

min_text_length.description: Minimum required length for review text

error_messages: Empty input: review_ids array cannot be empty
Invalid rating range: rating_min must be less than rating_max
Required fields missing: One or more required fields not specified
Invalid text length: min_text_length must be a positive integer
Validation failed: Dataset contains too many invalid records to process
usage: Provide the review IDs and specify required fields and validation criteria. The tool will return cleaned data and validation statistics.

valid_review_ids.description: List of review IDs that passed validation

invalid_count.description: Number of reviews that failed validation

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and issues found
